title: Textile Sample, "Sole Stripe Verel"
medium:
Medium: Verel (70%) rayon(16%) and linen (14%)
Technique: vertical bands of plain weave bordered by gauze weave, joined by long weft floats
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 30.5 x 59.7 cm (12 x 23 1/2 in.)
description: Vertical bands of plain weave in green, yellow, yellow-green, dark orange, and light orange connected by a gauze weave of long weft floats in white. Number 447.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile Sample, "Sole Stripe Verel".
Medium: Verel (70%) rayon(16%) and linen (14%)
Technique: vertical bands of plain weave bordered by gauze weave, joined by long weft floats. Gift of Alexander H. Girard. 1969-165-1174.
